name: axios
text:
The longstanding but now hotly contested law that keeps online platforms from being held liable for what users post should be narrowed, conservative Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas wrote Tuesday.

name: axios
text:
Civil rights groups filed a lawsuit to extend Virginia's voter registration deadline, after the state's online system crashed on the final day of the registration period.

https://t.co/JxKyETmdz1
